entry.title: 堆场累计一览表
entry.variable: select CAST('#DUIC_#' AS VARCHAR(1)) AS DUIC,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), GETDATE(), 111) AS SYSDATE

module.name: A
module.sql: select duic_,pzno_,chan_,sum(zpzl_) from SINO_ZPNGTP where scbj_='0' and#1# group by duic_,pzno_,chan_ union select duic_,pzno_,chan_,sum(zpzl_) from sino_ycaitp where scbj_='0' and#1# group by duic_,pzno_,chan_

params.name: 堆场
params.select: <option value="A">A</option> <option value="B">B</option> <option value="X">X</option> <option value="C">C</option> <option value="D">D</option> <option value="E">E</option> <option value="F">F</option> <option value="G">G</option>

entry.title: 堆场状况一览表(ABX)
entry.variable: select CAST('#a.DUIC_#' AS VARCHAR(1)) AS DUIC,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), GETDATE(), 111) AS cldm

module.name: A
module.sql: SELECT * FROM (select a.kw_ KW,a.deng_ DENG,a.zzsd_,a.zzsd_+'-'+a.jbno_ JBNO ,cast(a.XPHO_ as varchar(8)) XPHO,cast(a.XPKN_ as varchar(8)) XPKN, a.FACE_ FACE ,a.CHAN_ CHAN ,a.ZPZL_ ZPZL,a.YCBR_ YCBR,a.ABBR_ ABBR,a.YUNY_ YUNY ,a.DHNO_ DHNO,b.JHQI_ JHQI,a.ZTBJ_ ZTBJ,a.ZSNO_ ZSNO , convert(varchar(10), a.DUIB_, 111) DUIB ,a.ZZNY_ ZZNY from sino_ycaitp A left join SINO_DHUOTP B on a.dhno_=b.DHNO_+b.line_ WHERE a.scbj_='0' and#1# UNION SELECT '合计：','','' ,'','','','','',sum(zpzl_),'','','','',NULL,'','',NULL,NULL from sino_YCAItp A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON A.DHNO_=B.DHNO_+B.LINE_ WHERE scbj_='0' and#1# )TT ORDER BY TT.KW

module.name: B
module.sql: SELECT A.PZNO_,CHAN_,ZZSD_,sum(zpzl_) from sino_ycaitp A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON A.DHNO_=B.DHNO_+B.LINE_ where scbj_='0' and#1# group by A.pzno_ ,CHAN_,ZZSD_ UNION SELECT '合计：','','',sum(zpzl_) from sino_ycaitp A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON A.DHNO_=B.DHNO_+B.LINE_ where scbj_='0' and #1#

module.name: C
module.sql: SELECT A.PZNO_,CHAN_,ZZSD_,(case when spbh_='1' then 'h < 0.3' when spbh_='2' then '0.30 <= h < 0.5' when spbh_='3' then '0.5 <= h < 1.0' end ),sum(zpzl_) from sino_ycaitp A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON A.DHNO_=B.DHNO_+B.LINE_ where scbj_='0' and#1# group by A.pzno_,CHAN_,spbh_,ZZSD_ UNION SELECT '合计：','','','',sum(zpzl_) from sino_ycaitp A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON A.DHNO_=B.DHNO_+B.LINE_ where scbj_='0' and#1#

entry.title: 堆场历史状况一览表(ABX)
entry.variable: select CAST('#DUIC#' AS VARCHAR(1)) AS DUIC,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), GETDATE(), 111) AS SYSDATE,SUBSTRING(CAST('#NY#' AS VARCHAR),1,4)+'年'+SUBSTRING(CAST('#NY#' AS VARCHAR),5,2)+'月' as cldm

module.name: A
module.sql: SELECT * FROM (select KW, DENG,ZZSD, ZZSD+'-'+JBNO JBNO , XPHO, XPKN, FACE ,CHAN ,ZPZL,YCBR,ABBR,YUNY ,DHNO,JHQI,ZTBJ, ZSNO , convert(varchar(10), DUIB, 111) as DUIB ,ZZNY from SINO_RPT_DC WHERE #1# UNION SELECT '合计：','','' ,'',NULL,NULL,'','',sum(zpzl),'','','','',NULL,'','',NULL,NULL from SINO_RPT_DC WHERE #1# )TT ORDER BY TT.KW

module.name: B
module.sql: SELECT PZNO,CHAN,ZZSD,sum(zpzl) from SINO_RPT_DC where #1# group by pzno ,CHAN,ZZSD UNION SELECT '合计：','','',sum(zpzl) from SINO_RPT_DC where #1#

module.name: C
module.sql: SELECT PZNO,CHAN,ZZSD,(case when spbh='1' then 'h < 0.3' when spbh='2' then '0.30 <= h < 0.5' when spbh='3' then '0.5 <= h < 1.0' end ),sum(zpzl) from SINO_RPT_DC where #1# group by pzno,CHAN,spbh,ZZSD UNION SELECT '合计：','','','',sum(zpzl) from SINO_RPT_DC where #1#

entry.title: 堆场状况一览表(CDEFG)
entry.variable: select CAST('#a.DUIC_#' AS VARCHAR(1)) AS DUIC,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), GETDATE(), 111) AS cldm

module.name: A
module.sql: SELECT * FROM (select a.kw_,a.deng_,A.ZZSD_,(CASE WHEN a.PLQF_ IS NULL then ' ' else A.PLQF_ END) +A.ZZSD_+'-'+a.jbno_ JBNO , cast(a.XPHO_ as varchar(8)) XPHO,cast(a.XPKN_ as varchar(8)) XPKN,(CASE WHEN a.XPCN_ IS NULL then 'C' else CAST(a.XPCN_ as varchar(8)) END) XPCN, A.DMFX_,a.FACE_,a.CHAN_,A.PLQF_,a.ZPZL_,a.ABBR_,a.YUNY_, a.DHNO_,b.JHQI_,a.ZTBJ_,a.BLBJ_,a.ZSNO_ ,a.DUIB_,a.ZZNY_ from SINO_ZPNGTP A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON a.dhno_=b.DHNO_+b.line_ WHERE a.scbj_='0' and #1# UNION SELECT '合计：','','' ,'',NULL,NULL,'','','','','',sum(zpzl_),'','','',NULL,'','','',NULL,NULL from SINO_ZPNGTP A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON a.dhno_=b.DHNO_+b.line_ WHERE A.SCBJ_='0' AND #1# )TT ORDER BY KW_

module.name: B
module.sql: SELECT a.PZNO_,A.CHAN_,ZZSD_,sum(zpzl_) from sino_zpngtp A left join SINO_DHUOTP b on A.DHNO_ = b.DHNO_+b.LINE_ where scbj_='0' AND #1# group by A.pzno_ ,CHAN_,ZZSD_ UNION SELECT '合计：','','',SUM(zpzl_) from SINO_ZPNGTP A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON a.dhno_=b.DHNO_+b.line_ where scbj_='0' and #1#

module.name: C
module.sql: SELECT A.PZNO_,CHAN_,ZZSD_,(case when spbh_='1' then 'h < 0.3' when spbh_='2' then '0.30 <= h < 0.5' when spbh_='3' then '0.5 <= h < 1.0' end ),sum(zpzl_) from sino_zpngtp A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON A.DHNO_=B.DHNO_+B.LINE_ where a.scbj_='0' AND #1# group by A.pzno_,CHAN_,spbh_,ZZSD_ UNION SELECT '合计','','','',sum(zpzl_) from sino_zpngtp A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON a.dhno_=b.DHNO_+b.line_ where a.scbj_='0' AND #1#

module.name: D
module.sql: SELECT A.abbr_,A.PZNO_,CHAN_,sum(zpzl_) from sino_zpngtp A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON A.DHNO_=B.DHNO_+B.LINE_ where scbj_='0' and a.DHNO_ is not null and A.CHAN_='1' and #1# group by A.abbr_ ,CHAN_,A.PZNO_ UNION SELECT '合计：','','',sum(zpzl_) from sino_zpngtp A LEFT JOIN SINO_DHUOTP B ON A.DHNO_=B.DHNO_+B.LINE_ where scbj_='0' and a.dhno_ is not null and A.CHAN_='1' and #1#

entry.title: 堆场状况一览表(CDEFG)
entry.variable: select CAST('#DUIC#' AS VARCHAR(1)) AS DUIC,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), GETDATE(), 111) AS SYSDATE,SUBSTRING(CAST('#NY#' AS VARCHAR),1,4)+'年'+SUBSTRING(CAST('#NY#' AS VARCHAR),5,2)+'月' as cldm

module.name: A
module.sql: SELECT * FROM (select kw,deng,ZZSD,(CASE WHEN PILE IS NULL then ' ' else PILE END) +ZZSD+'-'+jbno AS JBNO , XPHO,XPKN,CANG, DMFX,FACE,CHAN,PILE,ZPZL,ABBR,YUNY, DHNO,JHQI,ZTBJ,BLBJ,ZSNO ,DUIB,ZZNY from SINO_RPT_DC WHERE #1# UNION SELECT '合计：','','' ,'',NULL,NULL,NULL,'','','','',sum(zpzl),'','','',NULL,'','','',NULL,NULL from SINO_RPT_DC WHERE #1# )TT ORDER BY KW

module.name: B
module.sql: SELECT PZNO,CHAN,ZZSD,sum(zpzl) from SINO_RPT_DC where #1# group by pzno ,CHAN,ZZSD UNION SELECT '合计：','','',SUM(zpzl) from SINO_RPT_DC where #1#

module.name: C
module.sql: SELECT PZNO,CHAN,ZZSD,(case when spbh='1' then 'h < 0.3' when spbh='2' then '0.30 <= h < 0.5' when spbh='3' then '0.5 <= h < 1.0' end ), sum(zpzl) from SINO_RPT_DC where #1# group by pzno,CHAN,spbh,ZZSD UNION SELECT '合计','','','',sum(zpzl) from SINO_RPT_DC where #1#

module.name: D
module.sql: SELECT abbr,PZNO,CHAN,sum(zpzl) from SINO_RPT_DC where DHNO is not null and CHAN='1' and #1# group by abbr ,CHAN,PZNO UNION SELECT '合计：','','',sum(zpzl) from SINO_RPT_DC where dhno is not null and CHAN='1' and #1#
